Attacks.Name: Blazing Stare
Attacks.Effect: This gaze attack lowers the defense of the target by 1 for their next activation. If a wild is rolled, also inflict the Burn condition, dealing 1 automatic damage at the start of the target's next two turns.

Attacks.Name: Dragon's Inferno
Attacks.Effect: A fiery breath attack that deals massive damage. If a wild is rolled, the target and any character within range 1 of the target are pushed away M distance from Gouging Fire.

Attacks.Name: Scorching Wheels
Attacks.Effect: This attack simulates Gouging Fire charging at the opponent with fiery momentum. It deals damage and, if a wild is rolled, applies the Staggered condition to the target.

Superpowers.Name: Eternal Flame
Superpowers.Effect: Gouging Fire heals 2 stamina and gains immunity to Freeze and Stun conditions for one turn.

Superpowers.Name: Fiery Dominion
Superpowers.Effect: All enemy characters within range 3 suffer -1 to their defense until the end of their next activation. This does not stack.

Attacks.Name: Crimson Charge
Attacks.Effect: Gouging Fire unleashes a devastating charge cloaked in flames, pushing the target L distance if a wild is rolled, and dealing damage to characters adjacent to the path.

Attacks.Name: Flare Up
Attacks.Effect: This explosive burst of fire deals damage to all characters within range 2 of the target. If a wild is rolled, also apply the Burn condition.

Superpowers.Name: Dragon's Wrath
Superpowers.Effect: For the next turn, increase the strength of all of Gouging Fire's attacks by 2. This superpower can be used only once per game.
